name: MODERN ROAD-LIKE
description: You will randomly encounter enemies on your trip to cure the virus and defeat the alien leaders in an old school RPG style of game play. You will follow a path from the start until you reach the CDC which holds the man who can make the cure, the aliens who made the virus, and you.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP+ Processor: ANY Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 8  Bit Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: If you canâ€™t run this you need to buy a new computer
